title: Final disposition of bodies retained for medical
context: ยง327-36 Final disposition of bodies retained for medical education and research purposes. A university, hospital, or institution that holds a dead human body shall, when the body is deemed of no further value for medical education and research purposes, dispose of the remains by cremation, except as otherwise provided in section 327-14. [L 1967, c 240, pt of ยง1; HRS ยง327-36; am L 2012, c 75, ยง4]
